## Sexual dimorphism

For example, what traits are sexually dimorphic in the penguins dataset? Is the level of sexual dimorphism the same in all three penguin species?

```{r}
ggplot(data = penguins, mapping = aes(x = bill_length_mm, y=bill_depth_mm, color=sex)) +
  geom_point(size=1) +
  facet_wrap(~species)
```

```{r}
 ggplot(data = penguins, mapping = aes(x=flipper_length_mm, y=sex, color=sex)) +
  geom_boxplot(outlier.alpha = 0, alpha=0) +
  geom_jitter(width = 0, size=1) +
  coord_flip() +
  facet_wrap(~species)
```
